sections.text: Site Forger builds clean, modern websites for trades and service pros. SEO-ready, fast turnaround, and easy to use.

routes.purpose: Answer common questions with real, ready-to-use copy.

items.q: How fast can you launch my site?
items.a: Most websites launch within 7–14 days once we have your details and photos.

items.q: What do you need from me?
items.a: Your business name, services, contact info, any licenses/certifications, and a few photos. We’ll guide you through the rest.

items.q: Can I update the site myself?
items.a: Yes. We set you up with simple editing tools and provide a quick walkthrough.
We handle on-page SEO and structure so you’re set up to rank. We also optimize your Google Business Profile.
Pricing depends on scope. Most clients start with a straightforward site and add features over time. Get a quick quote via the contact form.
